Description:
We need to add a user authentication system with login, logout, and password reset functionality. The system should use JWT tokens and secure password hashing.

Requirements:
- Login form with validation
- Password reset via email
- Remember me functionality
- Account lockout after failed attempts
Creator: John Doe

Description: The navigation bar doesn't work correctly on mobile devices.
Creator: Jane Smith

Description:
The database queries are running slow, especially on the user dashboard. We need to optimize the following queries:

1. User activity history
2. Dashboard statistics
3. Report generation

Consider adding indexes for frequently accessed columns and reviewing the join operations in complex queries.
Creator: John Doe

Description: Update API documentation with new endpoints
Creator: Alex Johnson

Description:
Add dark mode support to the application UI. This should include:

- A toggle switch in the user settings
- Persistent preference saving
- Appropriate color scheme that meets accessibility standards
- Automatic switching based on system preferences

The implementation should use CSS variables for easy theming.
Creator: Jane Smith

Description: Users report sometimes getting stuck on the login page after entering correct credentials.
Creator: Alex Johnson

Description:
Users need to be able to export their data to CSV format. This should be available on the reports page and should include options for selecting date ranges and data categories.

Technical details:
- Use a streaming approach for large datasets
- Include proper header formatting
- Handle special characters and escaping
- Add progress indicator for large exports
Creator: John Doe

Description: Improve error handling throughout the application
Creator: Alex Johnson

Description:
The image gallery is loading slowly for users with many images. Implement the following optimizations:

1. Lazy loading for images not in the viewport
2. Image compression and responsive sizes
3. Pagination or infinite scrolling instead of loading all at once
4. Preloading of adjacent images

Also consider using a CDN for faster image delivery and caching.
Creator: Jane Smith

Description: Update all npm packages to their latest versions
Creator: John Doe

Summary: Add unit tests for API endpoints
Description:
We need comprehensive unit tests for our API endpoints to ensure they work correctly with various inputs and error scenarios. Cover the following areas:

1. Authentication endpoints (login, logout, refresh token)
2. User management endpoints (create, update, delete)
3. Data CRUD operations
4. Error handling and edge cases

Use Jest and Supertest for the testing framework.
Creator: Alex Johnson

Description: User profile image upload is not working on Safari browsers.
Creator: Jane Smith

Description:
Add rate limiting to our API endpoints to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage. Implementation should:

- Use token bucket algorithm
- Apply different limits for authenticated vs unauthenticated users
- Include rate limit headers in responses
- Log excessive usage attempts
- Provide clear error messages when limits are exceeded

This will help improve overall system stability and security.
Creator: John Doe

Description: Update the privacy policy page with new GDPR requirements
Creator: Sarah Williams

Description:
Current database backup process is taking too long and affecting system performance. Optimize by:

1. Switching to incremental backups on weekdays
2. Performing full backups only on weekends
3. Compressing backup files before transferring to storage
4. Scheduling backups during low-traffic periods
5. Implementing parallel processing for large tables

Also add monitoring to ensure backups complete successfully and implement alerting for any failures.
Creator: John Doe

Description: The search function is not returning relevant results
Creator: Sarah Williams

Description:
Implement multi-language support throughout the application to enhance global accessibility. Requirements:

- Support for English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese initially
- Implement i18n framework with JSON-based translation files
- Add language selector in user settings
- Auto-detect language based on browser settings
- Ensure all date, time, currency, and number formats adjust to locale
- Make sure all UI elements properly handle text expansion for languages that require more space

This is a high priority feature for our Q2 international expansion.
Creator: John Doe
